item.title: DAT hyperproxy conceptualize
item.description: Abstracts This blog entails the discussion between @stayfun_ and I this Sunday on our brainstorming session for Hyperproxy. Introduction We had a discussion with @joeahand 7 days ago regarding what we can do to most effectively contribute to the Dat project. The project we decided to work on is related to this comment that Joe left on an issue in dat-js, the original project we planned to work on.

item.title: DAT White Paper Dissection
item.description: Abstracts This is a technical log on our progress on the FOSS project. It is the second week of Sprint 1, and the Rochester weather is ever forgiving. My ankles were soaked in snow for at least three days straight, and my shoes had turned into a bleak white shade. Our initial goal of Sprint 1 week 2 is to research and understand as much as possible about the Dat-js library as well as the DAT protocol as a whole from their white paper.
